If you want to play it in NO$GBA there's a fix, add this code in Cheats, select Action Replay DS and in RAW mode.
02006F2C 00000000
02180B8C 00000000

There's a fix for NO$GBA add this as an Action Replay DS cheat in RAW mode:
02006F2C 00000000
02180B8C 00000000
